actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from OMB.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from VA.
Committee on Veterans. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 917 ordered to be reported.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1003 of title 38, United States Code, relating to memorial areas and appropriate memorials to honor the memory of certain deceased members of the Armed Forces whose remains were buried at sea, have not been identified, or were nonrecoverable.

summary.text: Amends the National Cemeteries Act of 1973, with respect to memorial areas honoring veterans whose remains were unrecoverable or unidentifiable, to include those veterans whose remains have been donated for use in medical research or training.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1003 of title 38, United States Code, relating to memorial areas and appropriate memorials to honor the memory of certain deceased members of the Armed Forces whose remains were buried at sea, have not been identified, or were nonrecoverable.
